trans-unit.resname: TSP·274 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand and you're not playing first, you may begin the game with CARDNAME in play with a luck counter on it. If you do, remove a card in your hand from the game.
trans-unit.target: 若你起手的手牌包含了宝石洞穴，且你并非先手，你可以让它在场来开始游戏，且上面有一个运气指示物。 若你如此作，将你手上一张牌移出对战。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·274 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If CARDNAME has a luck counter on it, instead add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 如果宝石洞穴上面有运气指示物，则改为加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·275 | Kher Keep | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 喀尔寨

trans-unit.resname: TSP·275 | Kher Keep | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·275 | Kher Keep | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}, {T}: Put a 0/1 red Kobold creature token named Kobolds of CARDNAME into play.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}，{T}：将一个0/1红色，名称为喀尔寨鬼崽的鬼崽衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·276 | Molten Slagheap | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 渣滓熔堆

trans-unit.resname: TSP·276 | Molten Slagheap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·276 | Molten Slagheap | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：在渣滓熔堆上放置一个储藏指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·276 | Molten Slagheap | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}, Remove X storage counters from CARDNAME: Add X mana in any combination of {B} and/or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，从渣滓熔堆上移去X个储藏指示物：加X点法术力到你的法术力池中，且为{B}和／或{R}的任意组合。

trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：在盐壳草原上放置一个储藏指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·277 | Saltcrusted Steppe | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}, Remove X storage counters from CARDNAME: Add X mana in any combination of {G} and/or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，从盐壳草原上移去X个储藏指示物：加X点法术力到你的法术力池中，且为{G}和／或{W}的任意组合。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·278 | Swarmyard | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 暴群墓场

trans-unit.resname: TSP·278 | Swarmyard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·278 | Swarmyard | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Regenerate target Insect, Rat, Spider, or Squirrel.
trans-unit.target: {T}：重生目标昆虫，老鼠，蜘蛛，或松鼠。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·279 | Terramorphic Expanse | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 地塑旷野

trans-unit.resname: TSP·279 | Terramorphic Expanse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲地塑旷野：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·280 | Urza's Factory | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 克撒的工厂

trans-unit.resname: TSP·280 | Urza's Factory | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: TSP·280 | Urza's Factory | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {7}, {T}: Put a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: {7}，{T}：将一个2/2组装工人神器生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·281 | Vesuva | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 维苏瓦

trans-unit.resname: TSP·281 | Vesuva | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, you may choose a land in play. If you do, CARDNAME comes into play tapped as a copy of the chosen land.
trans-unit.target: 于维苏瓦进场时，你可以选择场上的一个地。 如果你如此作，则维苏瓦需横置进场，且为该地的复制。
